welcome: This page demonstrates multiple React apps embedded in a single HTML document. Each section below is a separate React app.
about: Are We? Yes we are a team of developers dedicated to creating helpful and interactive web applications. This test page showcases our ability to implement multiple React components seamlessly.
services: We offer a range of services including Web Development, Mobile App Development, UI/UX Design, and Cloud Solutions.
contact: If you have any questions or need further information, please reach out to us at info@ourcompany.com or call +123 456 7890.
instructions: First, create a new React project using Create React App: npx create-react-app my-app. Navigate to the src directory and create a new file for your component: src/MyComponent.js. Inside this file, define your component. Import and use your component in the main App component. Start the development server: npm start.
